TEXT.TITLE: BANKAMERICA'S <BAC> COOPER JOINS ISFA
TEXT.BODY: ISFA Corp said Thomas A. Cooper, who recently resigned as president of BankAmerica Corp, has been named chairman and chief executive officer of ISFA. ISFA operates Invest, a full-service brokerage program for banks, and Insure, a retail insurance program. Reuter
